details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.5 Extended graphics state - TransferFunction in halftones
details.description: The TransferFunction key in a halftone dictionary shall be used only as required by ISO 32000-1.

rule.description: The TransferFunction key in a halftone dictionary shall be used only as required by ISO 32000-1.
rule.test: colorantName == 'Default' || ((colorantName == null || colorantName == 'Cyan' || colorantName == 'Magenta' || colorantName == 'Yellow' || colorantName == 'Black') ? TransferFunction == null : TransferFunction != null)

error.message: Custom TransferFunction in a Halftone dictionary is not permitted for primary (CMYK) colorants
